description: List transport order stop materials with filtering and pagination.

flags.description: Filter by transport order material ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: --transport-order-material

flags.description: Filter by transport order stop ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.name: --transport-order-stop

permissions: Requires authorization via TransportOrderStopPolicy for the related transport_order_stop (delegated policy).
validation_notes: Filter values for --transport-order-material and --transport-order-stop accept comma-separated IDs.
